definition: rule of law/to rule by law
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research
to rule according to the law

sentences.english: The law system in modern Asia is a "running after" system by nature.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲現代法治是一種“追趕型”法治。

sentences.english: The law system in modern Asia is a "running after" system by nature.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲現代法治是一種“追趕型”法治。

sentences.english: Visitors from abroad are hoped to help us to maintain law and order.
sentences.chinese: 請國外訪者協助我們維持法治與秩序。

sentences.english: Free country is the Common-law Rechtsstaat.
sentences.chinese: 自由國傢俱有普通法法治國的形式。

sentences.english: The government by law and the law must become gradually suitably forgive favor the society to be harmonious.
sentences.chinese: 法治和法律要逐漸變得適當寬容以利於社會和諧。

sentences.english: To administer by morals and administer by law are complementary.
sentences.chinese: 德治與法治從來都是相輔相成的，二者缺一不可。

sentences.english: He said that rule by law is a fundamental strategy of China.
sentences.chinese: 他說，依法治國是中國的基本方略。

sentences.english: Ruling by law is the fruits of development with political civilization.
sentences.chinese: 法治是人類社會政治文明發展的成果。

sentences.english: Part V of the prospect of "two regulation" of the prospects for reform of the rule of law.
sentences.chinese: 第五部門鋪望了“兩規”的法治化改造前景。

sentences.english: China is a country under the rule of law, thus the case you mentioned will be handled acoording to law.
sentences.chinese: 中國是一個法治國家，有關案件會得到依法處理。

sentences.english: Comprehensive management of public security (CMPS) must be ruled by law.
sentences.chinese: 社會治安綜合治理必須走法治化之路。

sentences.english: Rule of law and autonomy are different authoritative power of dispute solution.
sentences.chinese: 法治和自治是解紛方式的不同權威力量。

sentences.english: The amending power is also an important power in constitutional country.
sentences.chinese: 修憲權是憲政法治國家的重要權力。

sentences.english: China is marching forward to the world of the rule of law difficultly.
sentences.chinese: 中國正朝着法治社會的方向艱難地行進着。

sentences.english: Part Four is about the practice of unifying rule of law and rule of morality.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分談法治與德治統一之實踐論。

sentences.english: In the law-based society, the property is the law relation, and various rights that belong to the subject.
sentences.chinese: 法治社會，財產是法律關係，是主體擁有的各種權利。

definition: rule by virtue/rule by setting virtuous example (Confucian ideal)
to rule according to the law
to promote knowledge of laws/rights awareness
